page.title: 04FLORA & FAUNA:FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: {COMMON}FLOWERS:buttercup,daisy,dogrose dandelion,cow parsley,ragged robin, willow herb,poppies,meadowsweet,clover speedwell,convolvulus,primroses,blue- bells,celandines,groundsel & violets. Common insects: flies,wasps,woodlice, dragonflies,butterflies,ants,beetles, moths,ladybirds,bees & craneflies.{ Common Birds:sparrows,starling,thrush, blackbird,swift,swallow,pied wagtail, greenfinch,pigeon,chaffinch,kestrels, rooks, crows,housemartins, and herons. Common Animals:rabbits,squirrels,mice, rats,voles,hedgehogs,stoats,badgers, foxes,moles and weasels.{Common Trees: ash,willow,sycamore,oak,beech,chestnut poplar,pine,rowan,Leyland Cyprus,& elm {Fruit Trees:}apple,pear,plum,& cherry. {Hedge Rows:}Farmers have grubbed out many hedgerows to use larger machinery in agriculture.Hedges are of hawthorn, blackthorn,sloe,dogrose,& whitethorn.
